xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 14 May 2014
xwikidoc.content: <vijay13> has quit 15:12 <mcupak> has quit 15:35 <vijay13> has quit 16:47 <akats> has joined #phenotips 16:48 <akats> there is currently no way to get all the the direct children of an ontology term is there? 16:48 <akats> in a nicely coded api that is 16:49 <sdumitriu> There is 16:49 <sdumitriu> Well, not a very simple one 16:51 <sdumitriu> $services.ontologies.hpo.search({'is_a': 'HP:0000118'}) 16:51 <mcupak> has quit 16:52 <akats> oh I see. Thank you. 18:00 <akats> has quit 19:43 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips
